subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Iona Coach Tim Cluess announced late Saturday that he had “recommitted to coaching the Gaels,” taking himself out of the running for the opening at Hofstra, according to a news release.
snippet: Iona Coach Tim Cluess announced late Saturday that he had “recommitted to coaching the Gaels,” taking himself out of the running for the opening at Hofstra, according to a news release.
